author: aadamchik
msg: fixes resulting from using multi-tier features.
1. allowing to use ObjectIds in query parameters (not just DataObjects)
2. Translating client query parameters to the server ones.
3. A prototype of client relationship query

author: aadamchik

userId and password back to HessianConnector and enabling basic auth
